text: PROJECT INTEGRATION MANAGER PROJECT INTEGRATION MANAGER Current: PROJECT INTEGRATION MANAGER - ACRELEC AMERICA McKees Rocks, PA To join your team as the Technical Program Manager Work Experience PROJECT INTEGRATION MANAGER ACRELEC AMERICA - Pittsburgh, PA 2019 to Present Managed the Technology Integration Department, and oversaw all client projects.
